Reviews.Title: Thick vinyl
Reviews.Author: M. Bentley
Reviews.Content: I bought this to put on my trash can, which my neighbors had been using.  It worked. Due to size, it was quite noticeable.

ProductInfo.Features:
The highest quality Vinyl Decal can be applied to any smooth surface
It is weather-proof, water-proof and resistant to scratches
The sign is your first line of defense against criminals
This is the quick, easy way to warn criminals that they are being watched
Package included: 2 of 11.5 x 8.3 inch security warning signs
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu 2 Pack of 11.5x8.3" Security Warning Decal Weatherproof Vinyl Window Alarm Sign Sticker for Home CCTV DVR CCD Video Surveillance Camera System WO9
